Uses of Interface
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IConstraintBase

Packages that use IConstraintBase
Package
Description
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema
Provides an implementation of the Module model (gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model) represented by a module-specific set of bound Java classes (gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding).
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding
A Metaschema module represented as a set of Metaschema module bindings.

    ITargetedConstraintBase
    Represents constraint metadata that is common to all constraints that are targeted at a specific set of nodes matching the target.
